text: Kalyan Singh (5 January 1932 - 21 August 2021) was an Indian politician. He was Governor of Rajasthan from 2014 to 2019. He also was Governor of Himachal Pradesh in 2015. He was a politician of the Bharatiya Janata Party from the state of Uttar Pradesh. Singh died on 21 August 2021 at a hospital in Lucknow, India from sepsis caused by multiple organ failure, aged 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors of Rajasthan Category:Governors of Himachal Pradesh Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Kalyan Singh
